name: Traffic Race Mania - Real Endless Car Racing Run Game
name_original: Traffic Race Mania - Real Endless Car Racing Run Game
description:
What happens in Vegas, stays in Vegas! The same goes for the stuff which happens during illegal street racing! Don’t think about the competition - think about yourself!

Your racing skills will be tested in 3 fantastic locations: A city by night, secret military base and a desolated desert. On top of that we’ve laid out 9 most famous super cars! The majority of them are mid engine, turbo charged, asphalt ripping beasts! Getting them under control will definitely be a huge challenge!

If you think that you have what it takes to master all three locations and every car, then don’t wait and download for free now!



Game features:

- retina ready graphics
- huge selection of fantastic cars
- realistic physics
- super addictive gampeplay
